svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.div:
span = kernel + (kernel−1) × (dilation−1)
For kernel=3, dilation=8:
span = 3 + 2×7 = 17 positions

div.div:
• Same 3 weights for all dilation rates
• Standard conv: 17-wide filter = 17 params
• Dilated conv: 3 params spans 17 positions
• 5.7× more efficient

switch.text: • Same 3 weights for all dilation rates...
